name: QuotedInspiration
0:
”Alexa, open Quoted Inspiration.”
”Alexa ask Quoted Inspiration to read me an inspirational quote.”
”Alexa ask Quoted Inspiration for a quote.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quoted inspiration
des: Quoted Inspiration is a skill that reads you an inspirational quote just when you need it. To get an inspirational quote from Quoted Inspiration, simply say "Alexa, ask Quoted Inspiration for a quote", and some of the most inspirational quotes in the history of the spoken word come to you in an instant.
